name: Astrovania
description:
!!! IMPORTANT !!!

1) Run the game in Fullscreen mode if you're playing web version, else it will be rendered incorrectly

2) It may be loud, so don't set your volume too high

3) Jetpack sound effect ins't working in web version

 (idk what the reasons are, tried to fix 😢) 

This is my 2DPlatformer project.

Updates I made:

  • Created 10 unique levels (game screens)
  • Tied them in, thus creating connected game world, to create a logical progression
  • Player now uses a jetpack instead of jumping
  • Some minor gameplay changes

Credits

Made by Vyacheslav Lyskov
